page.title: 11A Crossing Keeper's Life.
page.content: The road through{Stretton Heath}is crossed by the Shrewsbury to Welshpool railway line.{Mrs.Vasilewski}lives by the crossing and it's her job to open the gates when you ring the bell.The gates stay open from{9 p.m.till 4 a.m. because there are no trains then,but she has to close them before the first train of the day.After that she goes back to bed before the{7.30}milk tanker,which is normally the first vehicle. Mrs.Vasilewski opens the gate between {20}and{60}times daily but isn't grumpy even if you call when she's cooking chips,like we did.On Sunday she saw the new{Sprinter}train going to the Transport Festival at Welshpool.She'll miss her job when the system changes- British Rail plan to put in automatic barriers before very long.
